name: Tomato Empire
description:
Made for Paint Jam 2021

In this tycoon game, you grow tomatoes to fabricate tomato soup and sell it at the auction house! The more you sell, the more you can grow and the higher your score when the time runs out.

A fun project for a weekend, don't expect too much, but be prepared for the ensuing addiction to the proven formula of infinitely growing mobile games.

May contain criticism of capitalism.

Tips and controls

It is advised you play a 5-minute or 10-minute game to get the full gameplay experiene and still experience the ending. If you want to challenge yourself to a high score, the 2-minute mode is for perfecting you money-making scheme in a short amount of time.

There is a built-in tutorial but for all you overachievers:
WASD to move.
F to build on an empty tile or interact with a building.
ENTER to open upgrade/ability menu.
